body: the ordering in lib_paths matters. You've appended `CUDA_HOME + suffix` entries to `lib_paths`, which means they will be considered after system paths like `/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/`. What you need to do is insert them right after os.getenv('CUDNN_LIB_DIR')
